name: check_stock_levels
description: Fetches the current actual stock quantity for a specific item code across all warehouses.

name: generate_sales_report
description: Generates a summary sales report based on submitted Sales Orders within a specified date range. Defaults to the last 30 days if no dates are provided.

name: list_overdue_invoices
description: Lists submitted Sales Invoices that are past their due date and not fully paid or cancelled. Can optionally filter by a specific customer.
